New Records: Shakib Al Hasan scored his first fifty in 20 T20I innings
Aryan Dutt made his debut and took two early wickets
Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain took three wickets in four balls to turn the game in Bangladesh's favor
Mustafizur Rahman's cutters in the 19th over restricted Netherlands' score
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh's confidence was boosted by Shakib's return to form
Bangladesh's top order was studded with left-handers
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh's victory gave them a good chance of advancing to the Super Eights
Shakib Al Hasan's performance was praised as pivotal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant for Bangladesh's World Cup campaign
International cricket returned to Kingstown after a decade
Michael Levitt's struggles despite early success were noted
Others: The match was the 27th in Group D of the tournament
Bangladesh's win knocked Sri Lanka out of contention
